column2: For each visitor to our Web site, or Web server automatically recognizes only the consumer's domain name, operating system, and web browser version but not the e-mail address. Cookies are generated and placed on your computer when you visit a Web site. They make your return visits to a Web site more convenient. We do not use cookies to collect personal information, and we do not use cookies to retrieve information from your computer for purposes that are unrelated to the Web site or your interaction with the Web site.
